summary: This is a calendar entry for a scheduled call between Linda Singer and the DOJ regarding the SDNY investigation into Jeffrey Epstein. The entry is marked as attorney-client privileged and confidential, indicating legal discussions about the case.

persons.name: Linda Singer
persons.context: Appears as the organizer of a scheduled call with the DOJ concerning the SDNY Epstein investigation. The document is marked as attorney-client privileged, suggesting she is acting in a legal capacity.

events.title: DOJ Call on Epstein SDNY Investigation
events.description: A scheduled call between Linda Singer and the Department of Justice regarding the Southern District of New York's investigation into Jeffrey Epstein.

keyFacts: A call was scheduled for October 5, 2020, between Linda Singer and the DOJ to discuss the SDNY Epstein investigation.
The calendar entry is explicitly marked as containing attorney-client privileged and confidential information.
The document indicates ongoing legal and investigative activity related to the Epstein case in late 2020.
